alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 11:19AM MST until November 09 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Quick accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick and snow covered roads at times. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause tree damage. Travel across the passes in the San Juans may be difficult to impossible this evening due to near zero visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft
